verses.plain: Give ear to my prayer, O God; and hide not thyself from my supplication.

tokens.t: Give ear to my prayer, O God; and hide not thyself from my supplication.

verses.plain: Attend unto me, and hear me: I mourn in my complaint, and make a noise;

tokens.t: Attend unto me, and hear me: I mourn in my complaint, and make a noise;

verses.plain: Because of the voice of the enemy, because of the oppression of the wicked: for they cast iniquity upon me, and in wrath they hate me.

tokens.t: Because of the voice of the enemy, because of the oppression of the wicked: for they cast iniquity upon me, and in wrath they hate me.

verses.plain: My heart is sore pained within me: and the terrors of death are fallen upon me.

tokens.t: My heart is sore pained within me: and the terrors of death are fallen upon me.

verses.plain: Fearfulness and trembling are come upon me, and horror hath overwhelmed me.

tokens.t: Fearfulness and trembling are come upon me, and horror hath overwhelmed me.

verses.plain: And I said, Oh that I had wings like a dove! for then would I fly away, and be at rest.

tokens.t: And I said, Oh that I had wings like a dove!
would I fly away, and be at rest.

verses.plain: Lo, then would I wander far off, and remain in the wilderness. Selah.

tokens.t: Lo,
would I wander far off,
remain in the wilderness. Selah.

verses.plain: I would hasten my escape from the windy storm and tempest.

tokens.t: I would hasten my escape from the windy storm
tempest.

verses.plain: Destroy, O Lord, and divide their tongues: for I have seen violence and strife in the city.

tokens.t: Destroy, O Lord,
divide their tongues: for I have seen violence and strife in the city.

verses.plain: Day and night they go about it upon the walls thereof: mischief also and sorrow are in the midst of it.

tokens.t: Day and night they go about it upon the walls thereof: mischief also and sorrow
in the midst of it.

verses.plain: Wickedness is in the midst thereof: deceit and guile depart not from her streets.

tokens.t: Wickedness
in the midst thereof: deceit and guile depart not from her streets.

verses.plain: For it was not an enemy that reproached me; then I could have borne it: neither was it he that hated me that did magnify himself against me; then I would have hid myself from him:

tokens.t: For
not an enemy
reproached me; then I could have borne
neither
he that hated me
did magnify
against me; then I would have hid myself from him:

verses.plain: But it was thou, a man mine equal, my guide, and mine acquaintance.

tokens.t: But
thou, a man mine equal, my guide, and mine acquaintance.

verses.plain: We took sweet counsel together, and walked unto the house of God in company.

tokens.t: We took sweet counsel together,
walked unto the house of God in company.

verses.plain: Let death seize upon them, and let them go down quick into hell: for wickedness is in their dwellings, and among them.

tokens.t: Let death seize upon them,
let them go down quick into hell: for wickedness
in their dwellings,
among them.

verses.plain: As for me, I will call upon God; and the LORD shall save me.

tokens.t: As for me, I will call upon God; and the
shall save me.

verses.plain: Evening, and morning, and at noon, will I pray, and cry aloud: and he shall hear my voice.

tokens.t: Evening, and morning, and at noon, will I pray, and cry aloud: and he shall hear my voice.

verses.plain: He hath delivered my soul in peace from the battle that was against me: for there were many with me.

tokens.t: He hath delivered my soul in peace from the battle
against me: for there were many with me.

verses.plain: God shall hear, and afflict them, even he that abideth of old. Selah. Because they have no changes, therefore they fear not God.

tokens.t: God shall hear, and afflict them, even he that abideth of old. Selah. Because they have no changes, therefore they fear not God.

verses.plain: He hath put forth his hands against such as be at peace with him: he hath broken his covenant.

tokens.t: He hath put forth his hands against such as be at peace with him: he hath broken his covenant.

verses.plain: The words of his mouth were smoother than butter, but war was in his heart: his words were softer than oil, yet were they drawn swords.

tokens.t: of his mouth were smoother than butter, but war
in his heart: his words were softer than oil, yet
they drawn swords.

verses.plain: Cast thy burden upon the LORD, and he shall sustain thee: he shall never suffer the righteous to be moved.

tokens.t: Cast thy burden upon the
, and he shall sustain thee: he shall never suffer the righteous to be moved.

verses.plain: But thou, O God, shalt bring them down into the pit of destruction: bloody and deceitful men shall not live out half their days; but I will trust in thee.

tokens.t: But thou, O God, shalt bring them down into the pit of destruction: bloody and deceitful men shall not live out half their days; but I will trust in thee.

footnotes.text: mine equal: Heb. according to my rank
Because…: or, With whom also there be no changes, yet they
bloody…: Heb. men of bloods and deceit
shall…: Heb. shall not half their days
